snippet: For a decade, Rafael Nadal ruled Roland Garros the way no other man has dominated any Grand Slam site....
lead_paragraph: For a decade, Rafael Nadal ruled Roland Garros the way no other man has dominated any Grand Slam site.

headline.print_headline: Adieu, Rafa: 9-Time French Open Champ Nadal Out With Injury
